## Meeting date and times:

* Nov 13 (Tue) 5:30 pm ~ 9:30 pm

## Meeting description:

* Fall business meeting of ASA GA Chapter 2018 sponsored by Emory Biostatistics and Bioinformatics Department

## Meeting agenda:

* 5:30 pm ~ 6:30 pm, check in and mixer
* 6:30 pm ~ 8:00 pm, dinner
* 8:00 pm ~ 9:00 pm, Keynote speech by	
    - Dr. Michael R. Kosorok
    - W.R. Kenan, Jr. Distinguished Professor and Chair, Department of Biostatistics,
    - Professor, Department of Statistics and Operations Research, 
    - University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
* 9:00 pm ~ 9:30 pm, Awards ceremony

* Rita Anne Rollins Room, eighth floor, 1518 Clifton Rd NE, Atlanta, GA 30322 (Grace Crum Rollins Building)
